label: 大番役
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: The imperial guard service in Kyoto. A Kamakura guard service (Kamakura↓ōban'yaku) was instituted after 1219 as a complement to the Kyoto ōban. The eastern service, however, was limited to vassals from that part of Japan. See dairi ōban.　[内裏大番]
